DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the acute effect of a standardized extract of KRG (Rg3-KRG) consisting of 30% total ginsenosides, including 10% Rg3 ginsenoside on arterial stiffness and blood pressure, as measured by the following parameters: aortic augmentation index, peripheral blood pressure, central blood pressure
DOC.brief_title: Korean Red Ginseng Rg3 Extract on Arterial Stiffness and Blood Pressure
DOC.criteria: Healthy Age 1870 years BMI < 30 kg/m2 Brachial systolic blood pressure < 140 mmHg Brachial diastolic blood pressure < 90 mmHg Main BMI >30kg/m2 Hypertensive (brachial systolic BP ≥140mmHg and/or diastolic BP ≥90mmHg) Pregnancy
